code: const fetchCongressGovPhotoData=async bioId=>{const url="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/api/congress_gov/photo/").concat(bioId);const response=await fetch(url);if(!response.ok){throw new Error("HTTP error. Status: ".concat(response.status));}return response.json();};const reshapeCongressGovPhotoData=data=>{return{imageUrl:data.member.depiction.imageUrl};};const getCongressGovPhoto=async bioId=>{try{const data=await fetchCongressGovPhotoData(bioId);return reshapeCongressGovPhotoData(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);return{imageUrl:'',error:true,errorMessage:error.message};}};export default getCongressGovPhoto;
